column1: Little Goat Diner////My past 2 experiences were great and I was constantly raving about Little Goat and Stephanie Izard's talent. However
column2: this time I ordered the reuben and it was very average. It had housemade Kraut but it was pickled for too long
column3: I had to pick mine off my sandwich. Further
column4: parts of the corned beef were incredibly overcooked.  Our server was also pretty MIA
column5: we had to stop her a couple times to get water refills
column6: etc because she was not attentive.
